data.comment: The match has started.
Swansea's Rhian Brewster is whistled for offside at Liberty Stadium.
In the minute 2, Brentford needs to be cautious. Swansea have an attacking throw-in.
Keith Stroud signals a throw-in for Swansea, close to Brentford's area.
Goal kick for Brentford at Liberty Stadium.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Brentford in their own half.
Said Benrahma (Brentford) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Swansea goal kick.
In the minute 5, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Swansea in their own half.
In the minute 6, Ollie Watkins returns to the field for Brentford after picking up a slight injury.
Attention is being given to Brentford’s Ollie Watkins and play has been suspended briefly.
Brentford push forward at Liberty Stadium and Bryan Mbeumo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Swansea defence.
Ollie Watkins of Brentford smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 8, Keith Stroud signals a Brentford throw-in in Swansea's half.
Brentford have been awarded a corner by Keith Stroud.
Brentford's Henrik Dalsgaard has run offside.
In the minute 10, Ollie Watkins for the away team is judged to be offside.
Can Swansea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brentford's half?
Brentford awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 13, Swansea are whistled for offside.
Ball safe as Brentford is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Keith Stroud signals a free kick to Brentford in their own half.
In the minute 16, Brentford are coming forward and Ollie Watkins gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Keith Stroud awards Swansea a goal kick.
Free kick for Brentford in their own half.
In the minute 18, Jake Bidwell (Swansea) has received a yellow card from Keith Stroud.
Swansea pushes forward through Rhian Brewster, whose finish on goal is saved.
Swansea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in Brentford.
Ollie Watkins's header is off-target for Brentford.
Swansea have a goal kick.
In the minute 26, Keith Stroud awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Swansea at Liberty Stadium.
Throw-in Swansea.
In the minute 27, It's a goal kick for the away team in Swansea.
Keith Stroud awards the away team a throw-in.
Keith Stroud signals a free kick to Swansea in their own half.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Brentford at Liberty Stadium.
Free kick for Swansea in the half of Brentford.
Ollie Watkins for Brentford is whistled offside.
In the minute 32, Swansea to take a throw-in in Brentford territory.
Keith Stroud signals a free kick to Swansea.
Christian Norgaard for Brentford drives towards goal at Liberty Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Brentford in the half of Swansea.
Throw-in for Swansea in their own half.
Swansea awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Ball safe as Brentford is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Brentford.
Ethan Pinnock (Brentford) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 38, Rhian Brewster (Swansea) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Swansea.
Swansea's Rhian Brewster gets in a shot on goal at Liberty Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 39, Swansea's Andre Ayew misses with an attempt on goal.
Keith Stroud signals a free kick to Brentford in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to David Raya for Brentford who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 40, Brentford’s David Raya is on his feet again at Liberty Stadium.
Goal kick for Brentford at Liberty Stadium.
Swansea to take a throw-in in Brentford territory.
In the minute 42, Can Swansea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brentford's half?
Keith Stroud signals a Swansea throw-in in Brentford's half.
Andre Ayew of Swansea is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 43, Swansea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Brentford in the half of Swansea.
Said Benrahma of Brentford gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Swansea goal kick.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Swansea.
Free kick Swansea.
In the minute 45, Swansea drive forward but Mike Van der Hoorn is judged offside.
In Swansea a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Mathias Jensen is booked for the away team.
Keith Stroud has blown to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Swansea at Liberty Stadium.
In the minute 47, Keith Stroud awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Swansea in the half of Brentford.
Henrik Dalsgaard (Brentford) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 48, Andre Ayew gets his shot on target but fails to score for Swansea.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Swansea in the half of Brentford.
Mathias Jensen for Brentford gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Swansea.
In the minute 52, Can Brentford capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Swansea's half?
Brentford have been awarded a corner by Keith Stroud.
Swansea awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Can Brentford get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Swansea's half?
In Swansea a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ben Cabango (Swansea) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 56, Brentford's Ollie Watkins gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Keith Stroud awards Swansea a goal kick.
Keith Stroud signals a free kick to Swansea.
In the minute 58, Free kick for Brentford in their own half.
Ball safe as Brentford is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Swansea drives forward and Jay Fulton gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 60, Keith Stroud signals a Brentford throw-in in Swansea's half.
Swansea are pushing forward but Andre Ayew's finish is wide of the goal.
Brentford have a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Keith Stroud blows against Brentford's Ollie Watkins for offside.
Swansea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Swansea have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 64, Andre Ayew (Swansea) has missed a penalty!
Throw-in for Swansea close to the penalty box.
Keith Stroud signals a free kick to Swansea in their own half.
In the minute 66, Rico Henry (Brentford) sees red and is sent off in Swansea!
Swansea to take a throw-in in Brentford territory.
Conor Gallagher (Swansea) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Brentford in their own half.
The away team replace Joshua Da Silva with Emiliano Marcondes.
Thomas Frank is making the team's second substitution at Liberty Stadium with Mads Roerslev Rasmussen replacing Bryan Mbeumo.
In the minute 71, Swansea's Conor Gallagher is on target but unsuccessful.
Keith Stroud signals a Swansea throw-in in Brentford's half.
In Swansea Swansea drive forward through Conor Gallagher. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 75, In Swansea Swansea attack through Marc Guehi. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Brentford at Liberty Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 78, Brentford awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rhian Brewster (Swansea) gets a yellow card.
Swansea's Matt Grimes breaks free at Liberty Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 80, It's a goal kick for the away team in Swansea.
Swansea take a 1-0 lead thanks to Andre Ayew.
Jay Fulton instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 83, Throw-in Swansea.
Throw-in for Swansea in the half of Brentford.
Keith Stroud awards Brentford a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Joel Valencia is replacing Said Benrahma for the away team.
Thomas Frank (Brentford) is making a fourth substitution, with Shandon Baptiste replacing Mathias Jensen.
Throw-in for Brentford in their own half.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Swansea at Liberty Stadium.
Brentford awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Keith Stroud signals a free kick to Brentford in their own half.
In the minute 89, Swansea awarded a free kick in their own half.
Keith Stroud awards the home team a throw-in.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Can Swansea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Brentford's half?
Brentford to take a throw-in in Swansea territory.
Throw-in Swansea.
Keith Stroud blows to end the match. The final score is 1-0.
Christian Norgaard (Brentford) has received a first yellow card.
